Reviews.Title: It could be better
Reviews.Author: Majdi
Reviews.Content: Got this camera so I could listen in on my worker's conversations, seeing as they talk a lot on their phones and to customers that gossip more than work. But being in a small store and running 10+ machines such as coolers, pizza ovens and warmers, there's a lot of noise/background sound. Even though the camera would be 4 feet away from the register, the sound is still very muffled. You can still listen and understand people, but if they whisper or mumble then it's just not going to happen. I've also noticed that it doesn't pick up high frequency sounds like a "beep" of a cash register no matter how loud it is.The image quality is still horrible, but being that this is Night Owl and a very cheap camera I shouldn't have been surprised. It does it's job so there's not much else to say.

Reviews.Title: So so camera
Reviews.Author: R. Hill "Rwh138"
Reviews.Content: I was looking to update my Mace-com cameras, I regret it now...Pros:> good night vision> MIC ok to good> good at distanceCons:> terrible close up / peripheral viewing> seems to be failing while being exposed to the outdoors> rolling waves when viewing camera via DVR

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Ronald Grande "zedthewizard"
Reviews.Content: hi, i had two of these, but i felt i needed to put one out there where it was more visible.  quick ship.  great item.
